original_text: Begin with the name of the oldest son and finish with the name of the youngest son. Write six names on one stone and six names on the other stone.
korean_text: 그들의 나이대로 여섯 이름을 한 보석에, 나머지 여섯 이름은 다른 보석에 새기라

sentences.original_text: Begin with the name of the oldest son
and finish with the name of the youngest son
Write six names on one stone
and six names on the other stone
